text: Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 114.1. Aap kehdijiey!kay mein logo kay parwardigar ki panah mein ata hun 114.2. Logon ky malik ki(aur) 114.3. Logon ky maabood ki(Panah mein) 114.4. Waswasa dalney waly pechy hut janey waly kay shar say
